Author: tigerchik
Text: I'm also at my parents' house and finding it harder because they, well, keep food in the house. I helped myself a lot at my own place by not buying food I thought I might binge on. I've binged twice since I've been here. Neither time was super awful but still. Aside from that I mostly like being home; the other major issue for me is misophonia - could do without an excess of the noises that drive me nuts

Author: Oh_Zalktis
Text: Im glad you've not lost control there during the holiday season. Just remember why you started and the long term picture. I'm okay, lost a little control but no purging or anything and am reminding myself of what's worth it in the future.
